<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for this version of the IR, obtained from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HistoricSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SubExpr.front()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">          HistoricSize = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;constu:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;minus:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;plus:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">          HistoricSize = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a78e9cb1527edb3cc1d1ee577257b5f0cac09e4cb866e5aa9bc0480359be9e7953">dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;LLVM&#95;fragment</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">          HistoricSize = 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the expression is malformed, make sure we don&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// copy more elements than we should.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">        Record.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = Record.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Load the global decl attachments after building the lazy loading index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t load them &quot;lazily&quot; - all global decl attachments must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// parsed since they aren&#39;t materialized on demand. However, by delaying</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// their parsing until after the index is created, we can use the index</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of creating temporaries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><Highlight kind="normal">Expected&lt;bool&gt; MetadataLoader::MetadataLoaderImpl::loadGlobalDeclAttachments() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Nothing to do if we didn&#39;t find any of these metadata records.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!GlobalDeclAttachmentPos)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a temporary cursor so that we don&#39;t mess up the main Stream cursor or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the lazy loading IndexCursor (which holds the necessary abbrev ids).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitstreamCursor TempCursor = Stream;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MetadataLoader::MetadataLoaderImpl::resolveForwardRefsAndPlaceholders(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><Highlight kind="normal">    PlaceholderQueue &amp;Placeholders) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Temporaries.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a9a3c9d867ff6bde97841c2b7983f5c70">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; !MetadataList.hasFwdRefs())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> : Temporaries)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Second, load the forward-references. This can also add new placeholders</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or forward references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MetadataList.hasFwdRefs())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><Highlight kind="normal">      lazyLoadOneMetadata(MetadataList.getNextFwdRef(), Placeholders);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point we don&#39;t have any forward reference remaining, or temporary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that haven&#39;t been loaded. We can safely drop RAUW support and mark cycles</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as resolved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal">  MetadataList.tryToResolveCycles();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finally, everything is in place, we can replace the placeholders operands</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with the final node they refer to.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal">  Placeholders.flush(MetadataList);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into another module, composite types only need to be imported as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// type declarations (unless full type definitions are requested).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create type declarations up front to save memory. This is only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// done for types which have an Identifier, and are therefore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subject to the ODR.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// buildODRType handles the case where this is type ODRed with a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definition needed by the importing module, in which case the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// existing definition is used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We always import full definitions for anonymous composite types,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as without a name, debuggers cannot easily resolve a declaration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to its definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
